name: Senor Banana Citchen Khaos
description:
Heroes come in all shapes and sizes...
All classes and creeds...
But the best heores..... ARE @!#$£&? BANANAS!  Senor Banana Citchen Khaos is a 3D platformer in the style of Crash Bandicoot created for the 2021 Tranzfuser employment Pathway Game Jam.  This game was made from scratch in 6 weeks by Ashley West, Connor Martin, and Casey Hawkes. Music by Josh Dutton Controls: Developers Ashley West - 3D & Texture Artist/Level Designer  Connor Martin - Game & UI Programmer/Level& UI Designer Casey Hawkes - 2D Artist  Original Soundtrack  By Josh Dutton
